 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/9e0be0b3d39c2b28362325952358f01c298400645.jpg> 	
Connect with Nature | Family Day 

Get ready for a morning outside in nature as you explore, learn, connect, and have fun with your teammates, family, and friends! 

You will have the opportunity to participate in a variety of rotating activities, including; Ghaf seed planting, Bee Conscious Workshops, Corals & Marine Conservation Workshops, Fabric Upcycling Activity, nature walk, and Sustainability Pledge Wall!

Saturday, 16th February 2025
8:30 am - 2:00 pm
Aventura Parks, Mushrif Park, Dubai
REGISTER NOW <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D79%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C617c8911cbd14c1dfe2108dd36e33834%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727074517312463%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C80000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=NiIbjJDUkkxZtZY6e%2BIkL1nPeiRu0pxqaTUemuVlO7g%3D&reserved=0>

SIGN UP FOR THIS YEAR'S DUBAI CORPORATE GAMES

Dubai Corporate Games are starting soon and we want you to be part of it! Join us at the Inspiratus District, Dubai Sports City next February 15th and 16th for an exciting two-day event filled with sports, teamwork, and fun. The event welcomes everyone across the Group -regardless of age, gender, fitness level, or vertical.

Don’t miss out & register now! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D80%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C617c8911cbd14c1dfe2108dd36e33834%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727074517333412%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C80000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=CY6hDn0nToolDfM54N5TprJCoVPVM37kSgoUPetmN8I%3D&reserved=0>

A Voyage of Light with Tanagra

As the world prepares for the sacred month of Ramadan, Tanagra invites you on a journey where the ordinary transforms into the extraordinary, just as simple grains of sand become exquisite crystal.

chunks.text:
As the world prepares for the sacred month of Ramadan, Tanagra invites you on a journey where the ordinary transforms into the extraordinary, just as simple grains of sand become exquisite crystal. In this first phase titled Foundation of Serenity, the story focuses on the profound beauty found in preparation. Just as sand is refined and shaped, so too are homes and hearts during this time of anticipation. 
 <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D89%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C617c8911cbd14c1dfe2108dd36e33834%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727074517466155%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C80000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=2fdMJobpPr3GjlM5cMDjg2zBjHRYX0%2BUVcPE3V69%2F4g%3D&reserved=0> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%2Fmtracking%2Flinkref.php%3Flink1id%3D90%26user%3D10620&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C617c8911cbd14c1dfe2108dd36e33834%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638727074517479071%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C80000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=vNr1LesAxcfs3NeGAS%2BYJ6BcKza%2BcQlRjdErZI%2BSGWI%3D&reserved=0>
